scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run uglify && npm run compressed-size
scripts.develop: npm run watch & npm run examples-server
scripts.watch: npm run clean && watchify src/dropbox-api.js -d -v -s DropboxApi -o dist/dropbox-sdk.js
scripts.browserify: npm run clean && browserify src/dropbox-api.js --standalone DropboxApi -o dist/dropbox-sdk.js
scripts.compressed-size: echo 'dropbox-sdk.min.js gzipped will weigh' $(cat dist/dropbox-sdk.min.js | gzip -9 | wc -c | pretty-bytes)
